```{r,echo=FALSE,messages=FALSE,include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
get_comparison_points <- function(group1, group2) {
  data.frame(grade1=c("2", "5", "2", "3", "5!", "3.5"), grade2=c("2", "3", "4", "3", "2", "5!"))
}

group1 = c("WPI", "WPF")
group2 = c("PMAT")

library(ggplot2)
library(ggrepel)
points <- get_comparison_points(group1, group2)
```

Group 1: `r group1`

Group 2: `r group2`

```{r, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(points, aes(x=grade1, y=grade2)) + geom_point()
```
